title: Boris Johnson will seize his chance to secure a Parliament ready to get Brexit done
text:
Finally, the British people will get a chance to elect a new Parliament, after months of watching from the sidelines as it frustrated Boris Johnson's ambitions to see the United Kingdom out of the European Union by October 31.

Of course, this assumes the Prime Minister's bill does not get snarled up tonight in a last minute row under the aegis of a demob happy John Bercow over which day in the second week of December is best to have the election, or whether 16 year olds should get to vote in it.

Still, there is good reason to believe that the parliamentary stalemate has broken at last thanks to Jeremy Corbyn realising he would look ridiculous in holding out any longer when the Liberal Democrats...
description: Finally, the British people will get a chance to elect a new Parliament, after months of watching from the sidelines as it frustrated Boris Johnson's ambitions to see the United Kingdom out of the European Union by October 31.
